title: Who should I buy with IP?
body: I saved up to buy {{champion:41}} after he was enabled but as it turns out, I had already bought him and just had no way of checking whether I had him. So now I feel a little silly and want to buy a champ to make me feel better {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I mainly got GP because pirates are sick as
